scripts.clean:default: rm -rf dist 2>/dev/null; rm -rf out 2>/dev/null; rm -rf build 2>/dev/null;
scripts.init:linux: virtualenv -p python3 venv-pywebview && if [[ -z "${KDE_FULL_SESSION}" ]]; then npm run init:qt5; else npm run init:gtk; fi
scripts.init:gtk: sudo apt install libgirepository1.0-dev gcc libcairo2-dev pkg-config python3-dev gir1.2-gtk-3.0 && ./venv-pywebview/bin/pip install pycairo pygobject -r requirements.txt
